frank.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: He was completely frank with her about what happened.
She was quite frank about the whole thing.
frank.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to print a sign on an envelope showing that the cost of sending it has been paid
frank.translation[3].definitions[0].defi: to print a sign on an envelope or package to show that the cost of sending it has been paid
frank.translation[3].definitions[0].exam: All mail for despatch should be franked.
If the volume of mail is high, afranking machine can save time.
